title: Marley Natural Ashtray Crystal
description: Marley Natural's Crystal Ash Tray is an ideal solution to complement your smoking ritual. Made from crystal and sustainably sourced black walnut.
cleaned_text: description Marley Natural Crystal Ash Tray Marley Natural's Crystal Ash Tray is an ideal solution to complement your smoking ritual. Made from crystal and sustainably sourced black walnut, this gorgeous ashtray brings much-needed functionality with its raised metal poker that allows you to easily remove even the most stubborn buildup. The super-stable base is felt lined to protect your surfaces.
